About us

The Servcorp Difference

Servcorp Coworking gives you the benefit of having full-time office space, but you only pay for the number of desks you use. Choose your own dedicated desk or sit wherever you’d like each day through hot-desking, available on a first come, first served basis. Servcorp also provides our members with unique options such as the use of our 5-star business addresses, a landline telephone number with a receptionist to answer your calls, ample meeting space, and our own inhouse IT team. You get all this plus access to 150+ premium locations around the globe.

Facilities

More than just a desk…

Servcorp members don’t just gain access to our premium workspaces, they gain access to all the tools they need to successfully run their business. That includes fast secure Wi-Fi, premium coffee & tea, and access to our community of 50,000+ like-minded imagineeers to buy from, sell to, and network with.

Testimonials

Our Testimonials

The luxurious atmosphere of the office and the wonderful service I get from the staff serve to enhance my company brand. I get to interact with other clients on the floor as well and form long lasting relationships with other like-minded entrepreneurs. I have always felt renting the space is only just the tip of what is offered.

Misako Hoshi

Coworking Client

In my business, trust is so important and having a high-quality space to do business helps build that trust. It had to be beautiful, new and properly managed. In addition, my business is not the type of business that requires me to be in one place all the time. I need flexibility. For that, Servcorp provides me with the perfect solution.

Yoshinobu Hatake

Coworking Client

It’s perfect to get work done, it’s clean and professional, you can focus well, and of course there’s a nice kitchen with a coffee machine for whenever you need a break. I’ve worked from home and from cafes in the past when I was freelance but a good coworking space is great to concentrate and get work done.

Benoit Dulche

Coworking Client
 
Pricing

Coworking Plans

Enjoy Fast, Secure Wi-Fi, Premium Coffee & Tea, and access to our 50,000+ member Community

Hot Desk

From ¥25,000/month

Perfect for people who work remotely or don't want to be tied down to a single desk. Just bring your laptop and get to work. First come, best spot!

  • Business hours: Weekdays 8:30 ‒ 17:30 or 24/7
  • Choose from any seat in the Coworking space.
  • Storage lockers available (optional)

Dedicated Desk

From ¥40,000/month

The perfect solution for people looking to enjoy all the benefits of a Coworking space and still have their own personal desk and storage.

  • Unlimited Access: 24/7, 365 days per year
  • Your own personal desk
  • Lockable storage cabinet

Optional Services

Address Package

Use our 5-star address as your corporate address on your website and business collateral. (subject to qualification)

Communications Package

Receive your own landline phone number for your business, answered by one of our professionally trained receptionists.

Secretarial and IT Support

A variety of other business support services are available on a pay-as-you-go basis. Contact us for more details.

COMMUNITY

A Community to Work With

As a Servcorp member you gain access to our 50,000+ member Community where you can connect, buy from, and sell to any Servcorp member around the world. You can find special discounts on airfare, hotels, software, and more only available to Servcorp members. Servcorp also provides seminars and weekly events, so there are plenty of opportunities to network and grow your business.

Only at Servcorp

Business Winners Need

Get more than just a space to work, get all the tools you need to succeed

A community to work with A team to delegate to Simple IT solutions that work A receptionist to answer your calls Rocket-fast, secure password Wi-Fi

  • The only community that can be called from your desk. A lawyer in New York or a friend in Sydney - it costs nothing to call them
  • You can buy from, sell to and collaborate with our 50,000 + like-minded imagineeers knowing we have verified their bona fide
  • You have contacts that know the market in every city in the Servcorp world. Our global team is available to help if travelling from city to city

  • Businesses never grow unless the driver of the business has time to focus on the business
  • Fully trained secretaries, IT experts and receptionists to make your life easy
  • Bilingual teams across the globe to help you expand
  • 12 team members/100 offices - industry average is 3 team members/100 offices

  • Global Team of over 100 IT professionals
  • Dial *1 to talk immediately with in-house IT support

Data infrastructure

  • Servcorp runs up to 1Gb to be instantly provisioned
  • 24/7 monitoring ensures the quality of services and maintenance of over provisioned capacity for optimum performance
  • Any internet configuration can be achieved in a Servcorp location from VLAN to VPN to DMZ to dedicated bandwidth
  • Redundancy to the Servcorp Global Network
  • 99.99% uptime across the entire network

Voice infrastructure

On top of the Servcorp Global Network, Servcorp has built a Cisco end-to-end voice network that mixes cloud hub services with on-premise security to deliver some amazing capabilities.

  • Receptionist answers your calls in your company name and extends the calls to your home office, mobile or wherever.
  • Change the way your calls are answered or extended remotely in real time
  • Our switchboard gives you the power to bank up to six calls simultaneously
  • Callers can press 1 to go automatically to your mobile
  • Our unique "Find me, follow me" technology allows incoming calls to be directed to any 3 devices simultaneously
  • The voicemail system can remind, auto call, or send the voicemail to email
  • Outgoing calls are approximately 25% below telco rates
  • The handset on your desk connects you to 50,000+ other like-minded imagineeers who can be called globally.
  • Conferencing capabilities for up to 15 participants.
  • Your local phone number travels with you.
  • Video enabled handsets available in all locations
  • Free inter-company calls within Servcorp's global network

  • Servcorp's general password secure wifi is as secure as a secure wifi can be
  • Password changed on a regular basis and our team continually monitor breaches to protect you
  • Over the next 6 months, locations that do not already have it will have secure unique password wifi
  • Servcorp spent 3 years and a substantial amount developing unique password wifi and own the IP
  • Security is vital if you are to succeed

Other Products

Servcorp also provides solutions for businesses looking for a private office for their team, or don't need actual office space

Serviced Offices

Servcorp's Serviced offices provide your business with everything you need to succeed. Start working the day you move in with a fully-furnished, sound-proof office and our multi-million dollar IT infrastructure. Servcorp provides offices to fit your business, whether you have a team of 1-5 people or even up to 20.

Virtual Offices

With a Servcorp Virtual Office you receive everything except the office: A 5-star address to register your business and use on your business collateral, your own local phone number for your business, a receptionist to answer your calls, and free access to Servcorp's Coworking Spaces for 3 hours/day.
